titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 89) making appropriations for the salaries and related expenses of certain Federal employees during a lapse in funding authority for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3273) to establish a bicameral working group on deficit reduction and economic growth, and providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 90) making continuing appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-243, by Mr. Sessions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 66.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 373.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 373, the question was put on ordering the previous question, and by voice vote, the Chair announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 186 (Roll no. 531).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 186 (Roll no. 532).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/8/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 89) making appropriations for the salaries and related expenses of certain Federal employees during a lapse in funding authority for fiscal year 2014, and for other purposes, providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3273) to establish a bicameral working group on deficit reduction and economic growth, and providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 90) making continuing appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration for fiscal year 2014.
